EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-02-11-Q1 Townhall Email Invite.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance: Partner Town Hall Meeting Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, Last chance to join us tomorrow for our Partner Town Hall Meeting <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8824097955124867329]]>, a quarterly webcast that gives partners the opportunity to learn about VMTurbo's new initiatives in 2016, as they pertain to the channel. Starting in 2016 it is our priority to support the channel's success. As a valued partner, we would like to invite you to review the following agenda:
- Company Momentum - Kickoff 2016 - Partner Program Update - VMTurbo App - New Sales & Technical Resources - Partner Wins & Awards - Green Circle Community - Upcoming Events & Webcasts
Register here <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8824097955124867329]]> to join us TOMORROW on Wednesday, January 20, 2016 at 12:00 PM ET. Hope to see you there! Sean Sean Finnegan Director of Channel Sales
